rows.label: qst002402_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, yes, I'm Ekurt.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0002
rows.name: Do you need something from me?

rows.label: qst002402_msg0004
rows.name:
Is that... really true...?
Azgall... he's... dead?

rows.label: qst002402_msg0005
rows.name: Th-this is... definitely Azgall's...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0006
rows.name:
I see. He ran out of strength before
he could achieve his goal...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0007
rows.name: Azgall and I used to be salvagers...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0008
rows.name:
But a dozen or so years ago, I
made a mistake, lost my radar,
and was wandering the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0009
rows.name:
Just when I was running
out of air and energy,
Azgall came to rescue me.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0010
rows.name:
But it seemed he had pushed himself
too hard, and he collapsed.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0011
rows.name: And we drifted to Luxuria...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0012
rows.name:
But as you know, Luxuria
is a closed land.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0013
rows.name:
There was no way we could
return to Superbia.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0014
rows.name:
We were outsiders, but many
people helped us, and we
managed to live here.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0015
rows.name:
Now I have a family and
live a normal life.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0016
rows.name: But he wasn't like that.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0017
rows.name:
He couldn't quite fit in,
and he always said he wanted
to go back to Superbia.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0018
rows.name:
He said the same thing
the last time I saw him.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0019
rows.name:
Leaving Luxuria alone isn't easy,
but I was cheering for him.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0020
rows.name:
But I never thought he'd
die here in Luxuria...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0022
rows.name:
You can have what's inside the
treasure chest he buried.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0023
rows.name:
It's useless to me now that
I've quit salvaging. He would
be happier that way...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0024
rows.name:
Anyway, thank you. Azgall must
be grateful that you found him.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0025
rows.name: ...I'm sure of it.
